name: HKWeatherCondition
desc: Constants that indicate a type of weather.

items.name: case none
items.desc: The weather condition is unknown or irrelevant.

items.name: case partlyCloudy
items.desc: The weather condition is partly cloudy.

items.name: case mostlyCloudy
items.desc: The weather condition is mostly cloudy.

items.name: case freezingDrizzle
items.desc: The weather condition is freezing drizzle.

items.name: case freezingRain
items.desc: The weather condition is freezing rain.

items.name: case mixedRainAndHail
items.desc: The weather condition is mixed rain and hail.

items.name: case mixedRainAndSnow
items.desc: The weather condition is mixed rain and snow.

items.name: case mixedRainAndSleet
items.desc: The weather condition is mixed rain and sleet.

items.name: case mixedSnowAndSleet
items.desc: The weather condition is mixed snow and sleet.

items.name: case scatteredShowers
items.desc: The weather condition is scattered showers.

items.name: case tropicalStorm
items.desc: The weather condition is tropical storm.
